DataConversion.C

00001 /* Functions for data conversion. Functions such as byte swapping, etc. */
00002 #include "sage3basic.h"
00003 
00004 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::ByteOrder
00005 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::host_order()
00006 {
00007     static const int i = 1;
00008     return *(unsigned char*)&i ? ORDER_LSB : ORDER_MSB;
00009 }
00010 
00011 /* Swap (reverse) bytes taking care of sign extension */
00012 uint8_t
00013 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::swap_bytes(uint8_t n)
00014 {
00015     return n;
00016 }
00017 
00018 uint16_t
00019 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::swap_bytes(uint16_t n)
00020 {
00021     return ((n>>8) & 0xff) | ((n<<8) & 0xff00);
00022 }
00023 
00024 uint32_t
00025 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::swap_bytes(uint32_t n)
00026 {
00027     return ((n>>24) & 0xff) | ((n>>8) & 0xff00) | ((n<<8) & 0xff0000) | ((n<<24) & 0xff000000u);
00028 }
00029 
00030 uint64_t
00031 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::swap_bytes(uint64_t n)
00032 {
00033     return (((n>>56) & (0xffull<<0 )) | ((n>>40) & (0xffull<<8 )) | ((n>>24) & (0xffull<<16)) | ((n>>8 ) & (0xffull<<24)) |
00034             ((n<<8 ) & (0xffull<<32)) | ((n<<24) & (0xffull<<40)) | ((n<<40) & (0xffull<<48)) | ((n<<56) & (0xffull<<56)));
00035 }
00036 
00037 int8_t
00038 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::swap_bytes(int8_t n)
00039 {
00040     return swap_bytes((uint8_t)n);
00041 }
00042

00044 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::swap_bytes(int16_t n)
00045 {
00046     return swap_bytes((uint16_t)n);
00047 }

00050 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::swap_bytes(int32_t n)

00052     return swap_bytes((uint32_t)n);
00053 }

00056 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::swap_bytes(int64_t n)

00061 /* Little-endian byte order conversions */
00062 uint8_t
00063 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::le_to_host(uint8_t n)
00064 {
00065     return ORDER_LSB==host_order() ? n : swap_bytes(n);
00066 }

00110 void
00111 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::host_to_le(unsigned h, uint8_t *n)
00112 {
00113     assert(0==(h & ~0xff));
00114     uint8_t hh = h;
00115     *n = ORDER_LSB==host_order() ? hh : swap_bytes(hh);
00116 }

00123     *n = ORDER_LSB==host_order() ? hh : swap_bytes(hh);
00124 }

00154 void
00155 SgAsmExecutableFileFormat::host_to_le(int h, int8_t *n)
00156 {
00157     assert((unsigned)h<=0x8f || ((unsigned)h|0xff)==(unsigned)-1);
00158     int8_t hh = h;
00159     *n = ORDER_LSB==host_order() ? hh : swap_bytes(hh);
00160 }

00166     int16_t hh = h;
00167     *n = ORDER_LSB==host_order() ? hh : swap_bytes(hh);
00168 }

00174     int32_t hh = h;
